1.definition: something toward which thought, feeling, or action is directed see also

2.definition: the purpose or goal of somethingthe purpose for which a contract or obligation is formed[əb-jekt] vtto state in opposition or as an objection [that the evidence was inadmissible]to state opposition esp. to something in a judicial proceeding [to the testimony on the ground that it was hearsay]
2.ed: to the testimony on the ground that it was hearsay]
